name: fedex-ops-platform
description: FedEx Operations Proactivity Platform - Predictive Analytics & Real-time Tracking
author: FedEx Operations Technology

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend start"
scripts.build: npm --prefix frontend run build && npm --prefix backend run build
scripts.test: concurrently "npm --prefix backend run test" "npm --prefix frontend run test"
